item.description:
There will be updates & reminders when we have more
information regarding the Expo & planned trip.

Halloween 2010 Chiller Theater Expo

www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

http://www.chillerthe...

Look at link for event details;

I will be contacting those coming with me
Later on.

We will be driving to
Chiller Theatre Toy, Model and Film Extravaganza
Hilton Hotel
Parsippany, New Jersey, 07054

Directions can be found on the link.

I do go a different way;
From West Haven I 95 to Exit 38 veer left towards
The Merritt Parkway that later becomes the
Hutchinson River Parkway to Exit 26 West on to
I 287 West & I 87. Take exit 15 to get off I 87
To stay on I 287.

(FYI Exit 55 has a Wendys or Burger King if you need a break.
The Burger King is closer to the High Way Ramp.)

Exit 39B to Rte 10 W towards Dover.
Exit on to Dryden Way.
Left on Campus Drive.
Left on Hilton Ct.

Pay attention to turns.
I had missed a turn and had to go back.

You can Park in the Building Complex on the Left.
Short Walk to the Hilton Hotel beyond the Pond on the
Right.

To answer the question of what is Chiller Con?
Chiiller Con has a few things happening; various vendors are selling their products such as DVDs or Model Figurines or Magazines or Autographed Photos, etc.
Newer Genre or B Movie Stars are there to promote their most recent genre movies.
Elder stars come out of their retirement to meet their fans.
Wrestlers, Writers, Artists & other kinds of entertainers also come out to meet their fans.

It is usually lots of fun.

There should be a listing of guests around early September.

http://www.chillerthe...

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

Remember to bring your cameras.
A listing of stars / guests will also come in handy.
There might be long lines to get some autographs.

The Expo is all weekend from Friday, October 29 to
Sunday, October 31, Halloween.

I am going on Saturday, October 30.

If more than one vehicle is going, then the passengers should
Share phone numbers in case the different vehicles have
To contact each other.

For Ordering Tickets send all payments to:
Chiller Theatre, Inc.
P O Box 23
Rutherford NJ 07070

http://www.chillerthe...

www.chillertheatre.com/c4tickets.htm

I will be spending Saturday night at
America's Best Value Inn
Whippany
(Near the highway & Hilton Inn.)

at (973) 539-8383

There have been discussions to leave on Friday night.
It is to early to make a decision on this.

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who are going. I will have a purple backpack.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Meets the Stars at Chiller Theater Expo
